sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均与"空气"有关。
means: atmosphere ：指围绕有的星球，特别是围绕地球的空气，即大气层。也可指环境气氛。
air ：指空气，也泛指一般气体。
gas ：指气态物，尤指供燃烧取暖或照明的气体，其中一部分称作瓦斯。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"态度，风度"之意。
means: attitude ：普通用词，指对人或事情的看法和采取的行为，多有某种不很明确或不便明说的感情色彩。
air ：含义广泛。单数形式指某人脸上表现出的心理活动，或言谈举止；复数形式指某人故意做作而摆出的架子。
manner ：多指某人在某一场合的言谈举止等。

word_mean: 气，空气：构成地球大气层中的气体混合物，无臭，无色，由1份氧及4份氮组成，但此比例可因情况而稍有改变。此外还含少量二氧化碳、氨、氩、亚硝酸盐及有机物
air-mass transformation 由于热力或动力过程使气团属性逐步改变的现象。
air-sea exchange  海洋和大气间能量、热量、动量和物质的交换。
air-mass analysis 对气团物理属性及其发展、演变进行的分析。
air-sea interaction 海洋与大气之间互相影响、互相制约、彼此适应的物理过程, 如动量、热量、质量、水分的交换，以及海洋环流与大气环流之间的联系等。
air-tight instrument 能防止外壳内部介质与外部空气对流的仪器仪表。
air-look device 在电子显微镜中，更换样品时保持镜筒工作真空的装置。

sentence.Network_en: The cold, misty air felt wonderful on his face.
sentence.Network_cn: 雾蒙蒙，寒冷的空气使他脸上感觉很舒爽。

sentence.Network_en: The volume of scheduled flights is straining the air traffic control system.
sentence.Network_cn: 定期航班的数量正让空中交通指挥系统不堪重负。

sentence.Network_en: America has enough firepower in the area to mount sustained air strikes.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国在该地区拥有足够的火力发动持续的空中打击。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2.a表示“加强，去到（to）“, 3.a表示“空气（air）“, 字母A的练习

空气喷涂 air spraying 利用压缩空气将涂料雾化并射向基底表面进行涂装的方法。 高压无气喷涂 airless spraying 利用动力使涂料增压,迅速膨胀而达到雾化和涂装的方法。.

lj.lj_ly: all goods must come in by air.
lj.lj_ls: 所有的货物必须用空运。

jx.jx_en_mean: &B{in the air} noticeable all around; becoming prevalent

lj.lj_ly: I smell violence in the air.
lj.lj_ls: 我明显地闻到了暴力的气息。

jx.jx_en_mean: &B{on 或 off the air} being (or not being) broadcast on radio or television
&B{take the air} go out of doors
&B{up in the air} (of a plan or issue) still to be settled; unresolved

lj.lj_ly: the fate of the power station is up in the air.
lj.lj_ls: 发电站的命运悬而未决。

jx.jx_en_mean: &B{walk 或 tread on air} feel elated

entry.def: Air is the mixture of gases which forms the earth's atmosphere and which we breathe.

example.ex: Draughts help to circulate air...
example.tran: 穿堂风有助于空气流通。

example.ex: Keith opened the window and leaned out into the cold air.
example.tran: 基思打开窗户，探出身到冷风中。

entry.def: The air is the space around things or above the ground.

example.ex: Government troops broke up the protest by firing their guns in the air...
example.tran: 政府军队朝天鸣枪驱散了抗议人群。

example.ex: People's cigarette smoke seemed to hang in the air.
example.tran: 人们吸烟的烟雾似乎会长时间滞留在空气中。

entry.def: Air is used to refer to travel in aircraft.

example.ex: Air travel will continue to grow at about 6% per year...
example.tran: 乘飞机旅行的人数将以每年大约6%的速度持续增加。

example.ex: Casualties had to be brought to hospital by air.
example.tran: 伤者不得不用飞机送往医院。

entry.def: An air is a simple tune which can be easily recognized and remembered.

entry.tran: 神态;感觉;总体印象;氛围
entry.def: If you say that someone or something has a particular air, you mean that they give this general impression.

example.ex: Jennifer regarded him with an air of amusement...
example.tran: 珍妮弗觉得他很风趣。

example.ex: The meal gave the occasion an almost festive air.
example.tran: 这一餐使整个场合有了近乎节日般的喜庆氛围。

entry.tran: 矫揉造作；装腔作势；做作
entry.def: If you say that someone is putting on airs or giving themselves airs, you are criticizing them for behaving as if they are better than other people.

example.ex: We're poor and we never put on airs.
example.tran: 我们贫穷但从不装腔作势。

entry.tran: （通过电视或无线电）播送，播放
entry.def: If a broadcasting company airs a television or radio programme, they show it on television or broadcast it on the radio.

example.ex: Tonight PBS will air a documentary called 'Democracy In Action'.
example.tran: 今晚公共广播公司将播放一部名为《民主进行时》的纪录片。

entry.def: If you air your opinions, you make them known to people.

example.ex: They sat for more than six hours, and both sides agreed they had aired all their differences...
example.tran: 他们一起坐了六个多小时，而且双方都认为他们已经表达了所有的不同意见。

example.ex: The whole issue was thoroughly aired at the meeting.
example.tran: 在会上完全公开了整个问题。

entry.def: If you air a room or building, you let fresh air into it.

example.ex: One day a week her mother systematically cleaned and aired each room.
example.tran: 她母亲按部就班地每周一次清扫所有的房间并开窗通风。

entry.def: If you air clothing or bedding, you put it somewhere warm to make sure that it is completely dry.

example.ex: When the shirts were clean, I ironed them myself, aired them and placed them in drawers in his room.
example.tran: 衬衫洗干净之后，我自己将它们熨好、烘干并放在他房间的抽屉里。

entry.def: If you do something to clear the air, you do it in order to resolve any problems or disagreements that there might be.

example.ex: ...an inquiry just to clear the air and settle the facts of the case.
example.tran: 一项只为消除疑团并弄清案件事实而进行的调查

entry.tran: 大模大样;摆架子;装腔作势
entry.def: If you refer to someone's airs and graces, you mean that they behave in a way that shows that they think they are more important than other people.

example.ex: The old cliché of the customer being always right is what gives them airs and graces.
example.tran: “顾客总是对的”这种陈词滥调让他们变得趾高气扬。

entry.def: If something is in the air it is felt to be present, but it is not talked about.

example.ex: There was great excitement in the air...
example.tran: 人人都感到无比激动。

example.ex: She walked away and left the question hanging in the air.
example.tran: 她走开了，将疑问留在人们心里。

entry.tran: 播送（广播、电视节目）；（广播、电视节目）播放/停止播放
entry.def: If someone is on the air, they are broadcasting on radio or television. If a programme is on the air, it is being broadcast on radio or television. If it is off the air, it is not being broadcast.

example.ex: She is going on the air as presenter of a new show...
example.tran: 她即将上电视主持一档新节目。

example.ex: Rockwell hopes the program can be on the air within a year...
example.tran: 罗克韦尔希望该节目能在一年内播出。

entry.tran: （消失得）无影无踪/突然神秘地（出现）
entry.def: If someone or something disappears into thin air, they disappear completely. If someone or something appears out of thin air, they appear suddenly and mysteriously.

example.ex: 'But where could they have gone?' he demanded. 'They can't just vanish into thin air!'...
example.tran: “但是他们可能去哪里呢？”他追问道，“他们不可能就神秘消失了!”

example.ex: He had materialized out of thin air; I had not seen or heard him coming.
example.tran: 他突然间神秘地出现了；我既没看见他来，也没听见他的脚步声。

entry.def: If you say that a decision or a situation is up in the air, you mean that it has not yet been completely settled or planned.

example.ex: He told reporters today that the president's trip to Moscow is up in the air.
example.tran: 今天他告诉记者们总统是否前往莫斯科尚未确定。

entry.def: If you say that you are walking on air or floating on air, you mean that you feel extremely happy about something.

example.ex: As soon as I know I'm in the team it's like I'm walking on air.
example.tran: 一得知我加入了这个队，我高兴得像飞上了天。

means.word_mean: 1. a mixture of gases (especially oxygen) required for breathing; the stuff that the wind consists of;

sentences.sentence: "a smell of chemicals in the air"
"open a window and let in some air"
"air travel involves too much waiting in airports"
"if you've time to spare go by air"
"he threw the ball into the air"

means.word_mean: 4. medium for radio and television broadcasting;

sentences.sentence: "the program was on the air from 9 til midnight"
"the president used the airwaves to take his message to the people"
"the breeze was cooled by the lake"
"as he waited he could feel the air on his neck"

means.word_mean: 6. a distinctive but intangible quality surrounding a person or thing;

sentences.sentence: "an atmosphere of defeat pervaded the candidate's headquarters"
"the place had an aura of romance"

means.word_mean: 7. the mass of air surrounding the Earth;

sentences.sentence: "there was great heat as the comet entered the atmosphere"

means.word_mean: 8. a succession of notes forming a distinctive sequence;

sentences.sentence: "she was humming an air from Beethoven"

means.word_mean: 9. once thought to be one of four elements composing the universe (Empedocles)

sentences.sentence: "This show will air Saturdays at 2 P.M."

means.word_mean: 3. broadcast over the airwaves, as in radio or television;
5. expose to warm or heated air, so as to dry;
6. expose to cool or cold air so as to cool or freshen;
1. relating to or characteristic of or occurring in the air;

example.en: The trucker grabbed a handful of air suddenly on the cross street.
example.zh: 卡车司机突然在十字路u口来了个急刹车。

example.en: It doesn't cost me a thing to make you dance on air.
example.zh: 把你吊死对我来说不过是小事一桩。

example.en: They both aired their lungs last night.
His air hook is stopped up with a cold.
example.zh: 他因感冒而鼻子不通了。

list.explanation: 未解决的，未决定的，不肯定的，迟疑不决的

example.en: The question of who will attend is still up in the air.
example.zh: 关于谁出席的问题还悬而未决。

list.explanation: 十分恼火的，非常激动的

example.en: My father went straight up in the air when he heard I damaged the car.
example.zh: 父亲一听说我把车弄坏了，立即火冒三丈。

auth_sentence.content: Fans will be gleefully punching the air within minutes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fans will be gleefully punching the air within minutes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fans will be gleefully punching the air within minutes.

auth_sentence.content: Our special programmes will be on air in spring.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our special programmes will be on air in spring.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our special programmes will be on air in spring.

auth_sentence.content: It had an air force mightier than Libya's.
auth_sentence.res_content: It had an air force mightier than Libya's.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It had an air force mightier than Libya's.

stems_affixes.word_buile: air空气,充气→n.空气, 天空 v.使通风
air航空+craft工艺, 手艺→n.航行器
air航空+port港口,舱门→n.机场, 飞机降落场
air空气,充气→n.空气, 天空 v.使通风

Sentence.sentence: Solar homes produce the most power on the hot sunny afternoons when everyone rushes home to turn up the air conditioner.
It's good to get back to some fresh air.
What controls remain for the users will be audio-based, so, for example, you'll just have to say "a bit warmer", and the air conditioning will adjust automatically
By inhaling air polluted with the virus.
We can pollute the air with acids, the rivers with sewage(污水), the seas with oil
James hiked, fished, learnt to sail and experimented with hot air ballooning.

means.word_mean: 天空, 大气, 空气; 气氛

sentences.en: There was an air of excitement at the meeting.
Many birds are flying in the air.

means.word_mean: 样子, 神态, 姿态

sentences.en: They were displeased with her haughty airs.
sentences.cn: 他们讨厌她高傲的派头。

sentences.en: The straw mattresses are airing there.
We air the room by opening the windows.
sentences.cn: 我们打开窗子让屋子通风。

jushi.english: Let's go out and have some fresh air.
jushi.chinese: 我们出去呼吸点新鲜空气吧。

jushi.english: The air was heavy with perfume of the flowers.
The air was heavy between us.
